definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) A mixture of mineral particles and organic material, used to support plant growth.
examples: We bought a bag of soil for the houseplants.

definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) The unconsolidated mineral or organic material on the immediate surface of the earth that serves as a natural medium for the growth of land plants.

( uncountable ) The unconsolidated mineral or organic matter on the surface of the earth that has been subjected to and shows effects of genetic and environmental factors of: climate (including water and temperature effects), and macro- and microorganisms, conditioned by relief, acting on parent material over a period of time. A product-soil differs from the material from which it is derived in many physical, chemical, biological, and morphological properties and characteristics.
That which soils or pollutes ; a stain .
A marshy or miry place to which a hunted boar resorts for refuge; hence, a wet place, stream, or tract of water, sought for by other game, as deer.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A mixture of mineral particles and organic material, used to support plant growth.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The unconsolidated mineral or organic material on the immediate surface of the earth that serves as a natural medium for the growth of land plants.

A product-soil differs from the material from which it is derived in many physical, chemical, biological, and morphological properties and characteristics.
That which soils or pollutes ; a stain .
A marshy or miry place to which a hunted boar resorts for refuge; hence, a wet place, stream, or tract of water, sought for by other game, as deer.

definitions.definition: ( uncountable , euphemistic ) Faeces or urine etc. when found on clothes.
( countable , medicine ) A bag containing soiled items.

main_definition: ( uncountable , euphemistic ) Faeces or urine etc. when found on clothes.
secondary_definitions: ( countable , medicine ) A bag containing soiled items.

definitions.definition: A wet or marshy place in which a boar or other such game seeks refuge when hunted.

main_definition: A wet or marshy place in which a boar or other such game seeks refuge when hunted.
